subject: Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Horse Racing
Animal Abuse, Rights and Welfare
organizations: People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals
lead_paragraph: Scott Blasi, an assistant to Steve Asmussen, the second winningest trainer in North America, had been caught on videotape speaking profanely about the stable’s injured horses.
snippet: Scott Blasi, an assistant to Steve Asmussen, the second winningest trainer in North America, had been caught on videotape speaking profanely about the stable’s injured horses.
